name: RUN TANK RUN (itch)
description:
Have you ever played Where's Waldo? The rules are easy: Waldo is a guy in a busy environment. Find him. 

This time, the game is slightly different. This time, there's just the two of you. Find him... before he finds you. This time, "Waldo" is a tank.

In RUN TANK RUN, you play a sentient T-34 tank named Sasha. She and a teammate are guarding their base while the others are away on a raid. But as night falls, they get a deadly guest. Can Sasha survive their visit?

This is a short horror/suspense game set in the Hummelverse. I made it as practice, to get more familiar with Unity. It's my first 3D game project.

I'm still learning game development, so if you have any suggestions/feedback/tips, please let me know!
